column1: 1. Original Dataset from McCutcheon et al (2019)
2. Original data grouped into mineral types with Ris
Feldspars = sum of Andesine, albite, anorthite,othoclase,microcline
3. Conversion from % by mass to % by weight
column11: NB Here I have replaced the mineral classes with the RI we will use to represent them
Olivine is used to represent amphiboles (in absence of RI for actinolite)
Enstatite is used to represent pyroxenes (enstatite,augite and diospide)
Andesite is used to represent Andesine, albite, anorthite, orthoclase and microcline
minimum quartz and feldspar content from original data and max of everything else = “maximum absorption end member”
feldspars reduced from 50 to 47.5 to make totals sum to 100
maximum quartz and feldpar content from original data and minimum of everything else = “minimum absorption end member”
0.3 kaolinite, 0.5 illite and 0.5 muscovite added to make total sum to 100

column1: We will use the olivine RI to represent Amphiboles
We will use the enstatite RI to represent Pyroxenes
We will use the Andesite RI to represent Feldspars
